## EventCallback type

A generic event callback, to be used when defining listeners for a [ChatCoreAwsConnect](./chat-core-aws-connect.chatcoreawsconnect.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type EventCallback<T extends keyof EventMap> = (arg: EventMap[T]) => void;
```
**References:** [EventMap](./chat-core-aws-connect.eventmap.md)
